markdownRemark.html: Villa Padierna is one of the most spectacular golf resorts in southern Europe and the entire Mediterranean. The golf course was design by the prestigious architect Antonio García Garrido, it has 18 holes, 5,714 m. par 71 and is characterized by its careful landscaping. The course presents a challenge for any golfer. It is of generous dimensions, the streets are narrow in the first half of the route and more precision is required than in the second.

frontmatter.title: Villa Padierna Golf Club

The course presents a challenge for any golfer. It is of generous dimensions, the streets are narrow in the first half of the route and more precision is required than in the second.
frontmatter.address: Carretera de Cádiz, km 166, Benahavis (Marbella) 29679 Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 165.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 165.00 euros
